channel.title: BMS - Technically not finished.(SPOILERS)
channel.description:
For though's of you who have played BMS and completed it you know its missing a huge part of the game known as the boarder world.
I myself am not satisfied with the fact that that I completed the game as is. Because the game it's self is missing a huge chunk of the original game, once you go through the portal to the border world. I expect to see the border world not credits and "To be continued" should have just added a troll face instead, I'm going to assume that the game was released like this so that they could just get it out the door after years of development and setbacks. Personally I would have rather waited a few more years or months to get a complete version of the game with border world. over all still a good remake but it should be a complete game start to end like the original.

item.title: BMS - Technically not finished.(SPOILERS)

item.description:
DiePoente:

Well, duh. You should start reading some news. They said 2 weeks before the release that Xen won’t be included and it will be delivered later via update.

This.

item.title: BMS - Technically not finished.(SPOILERS)

item.description:
I’m starting to think that most of the people now on the forums had no idea what Black Mesa or Half-Life was before the mod was released.

item.title: BMS - Technically not finished.(SPOILERS)
item.dc:creator: DaftMink
item.description:
Also it’s not like they plan to leave it like that.
They already said they’d patch the missing chapters into the release when there done.
Did you really want to wait years for a full release and possibly have them not offer patch support as a result ?.

Read full topic

item.title: BMS - Technically not finished.(SPOILERS)
item.dc:creator: Megagoth1702
item.description:
It’s a hobby fan project, it’s very high quality, it’s for free, you dont HAVE to play it, they annouced the missing of Xen before release.

Seriously? Get outta here…

item.title: BMS - Technically not finished.(SPOILERS)
item.dc:creator: MatttheComputerGeek
item.description:
For though’s of you who have played BMS and completed it you know its missing a huge part of the game known as the boarder world.

I myself am not satisfied with the fact that that I completed the game as is. Because the game it’s self is missing a huge chunk of the original game, once you go through the portal to the border world. I expect to see the border world not credits and “To be continued” should have just added a troll face instead, I’m going to assume that the game was released like this so that they could just get it out the door after years of development and setbacks. Personally I would have rather waited a few more years or months to get a complete version of the game with border world. over all still a good remake but it should be a complete game start to end like the original.
